Author: ifuckpineapples
Text: definitely electrolyte water while you're working out. moo sport is really good for this or propel. also, I usually take a potassium supplement an hour before to help me feel a bit less weak.

Author: paperklipp
Text: Electrolytes are really important while fasting and exercising.   Obviously everyone is different but a lot of people practice fasted cardio and find it improves their performance so if youâ€™ve only been fasting for a day you should be fine.
